alert.note: Alert for La Salle (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 10:59PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern La Salle County through 1145 PM CDT... At 1057 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Millett, or south of Dilley, moving east at 30 mph. Another strong thunderstorm was located northeast of Big Wells, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Millett, Los Angeles, Gardendale, Woodward and Fowlerton. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 70 and 82. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
